container.name: fa3f4aa4-a74a-4caa-beb3-6f6a7c672a2c
container.query: SELECT TOP 100000 DISTINCT p.page_title as parent_filename, r.rev_text_id as chunk_id, CAST(t.old_text AS VARCHAR(MAX)) as chunk FROM eng.nw_page AS p JOIN eng.nw_revision AS r ON r.rev_page = p.page_id JOIN eng.nw_text AS t ON r.rev_text_id = t.old_id
